mapper.insert: insert into INGEST(USER_PK, TITLE, PROGRAM, NAME, PHONE, CODEC) values (#{user_pk}, #{title}, #{program}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{codec})

insert into METADATA(FILE_NAME, WIDTH, HEIGHT, FORMAT_NAME, FORMAT_LONG_NAME, TAGS, DURATION, SIZE) values (#{filename}, #{width}, #{height}, #{format_name}, #{format_long_name}, #{tags}, #{duration}, #{size})
